version_description:
地球上添加了主要河流。
添加了五大洋七大洲的名称。

- 提高了地图的分辨率，以及整体的画面质量。
- 改进了地球旋转和缩放的方式，让手感更好。
- 对所有的知识扩展包做了较大的调整，使内容更加丰富，有趣。
- 给所有国家，知识扩展包添加了英文翻译和英文朗读。用户可以中英对照，了解世界的同时学习英文。

- 改进了地球旋转，放缩的方式和相机的视角，让手感更好
- 给一些主要国家添加了带有民族特色的背景音乐
- 添加了海洋的声音
- 添加了星空背景
- 添加了七大洋的名称
- 对操作界面进行了一些小的调整
- 增添了一些新的事物

- added English localization
- Fixed a problem with IAP
- Added 12 new animals
Added some new items
Fixed a problem when playing sound

Fixed the share link.
Some optimisations on performance.

Major updates:
- redesigned user interface for iPad. iPad has changed to horizontal orientation, which is more suitable for iPad users.

We will continue developing this app:
- greatly improved the earth appearance: used higher resolution textures, more details are shown, without compromise on performance.
- fixed some other minor issues.

We will continue developing this app:
- fix the "unable launch" issue on certain lower end devices.
- updated some sprites on earth.
- optimized memory usage.

We will continue developing this app:
- improved the Chinese text to speech when this app is launched under Chinese locale.
- improved heading view when select markers on Earth surface.

Major updates:
- Changed the overall interface to a modern design.
- Added many background musics.
- Improved highlight selection of countries: higher resolution borders.
- Fixed some countries' naming: e.g. North Macedonia which renamed itself in 2019.
- Updated populations with latest figures.

Major updates:
- redesigned countries information.
- added country specific greetings.
- added countries' fun facts.
- added currency of each country.
- added capital time.
- added mini map.
- greatly improved English speech quality.
- improved user interface.

This version contains the following optimisations:
- improved the loading time of thumbnails item view.
- reduced battery cost for this app.
- fixed the lag when opening the country details menu for the first time.
- improved the shader for depth of field effect.

Improved main screen bottom UI.
Added daily share.
Fixed some bugs
Added leaderboard for quiz feature.

- Improved leaderboard information retrieval.
- Fixed a display error for number of answered questions in leaderboard.

Added more quizzes.
Fixed some UI errors.

fixed some typos in quiz.
fixed UI issue when leaderboard not loaded.
Improved app UI appearance.

- added a new 3d model for scenery category.
- fixed some materials for 3d models.
